casebody.data:
JOHNNY BERNARD LEE v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 23886)

Foti, Dranginis and West, Js.

Submitted on briefs April 2 — officially released April 27, 2004 Per Curiam.

The habeas court did not abuse its discretion in denying the petitioner’s petition to appeal from the dismissal of his petition for a writ of habeas corpus.

The appeal is dismissed.
